answerText: Rabrindranath Tagore[10] This contemporary Indian writer wrote The Calcutta Chromosome and the Ibis Trilogy, which includes The Sea of Poppies and River of Smoke, which portrays the flourishing world of India due to the poppy trade.
heading: DRAGOON |2013 | 11 | 18 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: For 10 points each, name these Indian authors. [10] This author wrote "thou hast made me endless, such is thy pleasure" in the first poem of his song collection Gitanjali.
